chapter.title: Deferred and compensating tasks
chapter.para: Normal compensating tasks + permanent compensating tasks.

sect1.title: Compensating task
sect1.para: In some cases you want logic to be executed after a Transaction fails. This can be done using a deferred task.

sect1.title: Deferred tasks
sect1.para: In some cases you want logic to be executed after a Transaction commits. This can be done using a compensating task.
